dct_description_sm: Map 1 & 3 (Top-left and mid-left) are of the Eastern Hemisphere.
Map 4 (Mid-right): North polar projection to equator. California is shown as a large island with nearly flat northern coastline. A large bay to its north; Louisiana is labelled to its east.
Map 2 (Top right): North polar projection to Tropic of Cancer. California is shown as a large island with flat northern coastline. A large bay to its north; Essons Land is labelled to its northwest.
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Glen McLaughlin Map Collection of California as an Island courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact the David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
